name: MooN
description:
Formed in 2023 in the valleys at the foot of the Alps, MooN is a two-man band that combines heavy rock with psychedelic influences. With their groovy riffs, atmospheric melodies and dynamic breakbeat rhythms, their music balances intensity with a sense of exploration.

With its blend of heavy and psychedelic moments, MooN creates a distinctive take on modern rock, rooted in strong rhythms and mindful melodies. Their musical storytelling is taking listeners on a journey through moods and textures inspired by the nature that surrounds them.

name: BDO
description: BDO or Berlin Diaphonic Orchestra is a radio show that is always release on the 20th of the month, featuring modern classic, musique concrete and ambient tracks.

name: Ailamfa
description: Ailamfa is a musical journey through unfamiliar sonic territory, featuring the use of feedback loops to generate intricate overtones and the incorporation of manipulated field recordings, white noise, and analog synth drones. This experimental project reflects upon the spontaneous nature of improvisation and the techniques used in noise music to craft intricate soundscapes.

name: Berlin Swamp Fest
description: During the 2022 edition of the festival, i worked as a live sound egineer mixing a several bands in Zukunft am Ostkeuz.

name: Abanamat
description: We started this project together one day before covid hit Germany. During the time i played rhythm guitar and, we wrote a many songs together. Besides playing i also mixed and mastered the demo songs for Djinn and Night Walk.

name: XIO
description: Music for a commercial trailer of the light configurator.
